verses.verse: To Boast <WG2744> Indeed <WG1211> <WG3756> Is Not Profitable <WG4851> To Me; <WG3427> <WG2064> For I Will Come <WG1063> To <WG1519> Visions <WG3701> And <WG2532> Revelations <WG602> Of The Lord. <WG2962>

I Know <WG1492> A Man <WG444> In <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> <WG4253> Years Ago <WG2094> Fourteen, <WG1180> Whether <WG1535> In The <WG1722> Body <WG4983> <WG3756> I Know Not, <WG1492> Or <WG1535> Out Of <WG1622> The <WG3588> Body <WG4983> <WG3756> I Know Not, <WG1492> <WG3588> God <WG2316> Knows, <WG1492> Caught Away <WG726> <WG3588> Such A One <WG5108> To The <WG2193> Third <WG5154> Heavens. <WG3772>

And <WG2532> I Know <WG1492> <WG3588> Such <WG5108> A Man, <WG444> Whether <WG1535> In The <WG1722> Body <WG4983> Or <WG1535> Out Of <WG1622> The <WG3588> Body <WG4983> Not <WG3756> I Know, <WG1492> <WG3588> God <WG2316> Knows : <WG1492>

That <WG3754> He Was Caught Away <WG726> To <WG1519> <WG3588> Paradise, <WG3857> And <WG2532> Heard <WG191> Unutterable <WG731> Sayings, <WG4487> Which <WG3739> <WG3756> It Is Not Permitted <WG1832> To Man <WG444> To Speak. <WG2980>

Concerning <WG5228> <WG3588> Such A One <WG5108> I Will Boast, <WG2744> <WG5228> But Concerning <WG1161> Myself <WG1683> <WG3756> I Will Not Boast, <WG2744> <WG1487> Unless <WG3361> In <WG1722> <WG3588> <WG769> My Weaknesses. <WG3450>

<WG1437> For If <WG1063> I Should Desire <WG2309> To Boast, <WG2744> <WG3756> I Shall Not Be <WG2071> A Fool; <WG878> <WG225> For Truth <WG1063> I Will Say; <WG2046> <WG5339> But I Forbear, <WG1161> Lest <WG3361> Anyone <WG5100> As To <WG1519> Me <WG1691> Should Reckon <WG3049> Above <WG5228> What <WG3739> He Sees <WG991> Me, <WG3165> Or <WG2228> Hears <WG191> Anything <WG5100> Of <WG1537> Me. <WG1700>

And <WG2532> By The <WG3588> Surpassingness <WG5236> Of The <WG3588> Revelations <WG602> That <WG2443> <WG3361> I Might Not Be Exalted, <WG5229> Was Given <WG1325> To Me <WG3427> A Thorn <WG4647> For The <WG3588> Flesh, <WG4561> A Messenger <WG32>, Of Satan, <WG4566> That <WG2443> Me <WG3165> He Might Buffet, <WG2852> That <WG2443> Not <WG3361> I Might Be Exalted. <WG5229>
For <WG5228> This <WG5127> Thrice <WG5151> The <WG3588> Lord <WG2962> I Besought <WG3870> That <WG2443> It Might Depart <WG868> ' From <WG575> Me, <WG1700>

And <WG2532> He Said <WG2046> To Me, <WG3427> Suffices <WG714> Thee <WG4671> <WG3588> <WG5485> My Grace; <WG3450> <WG3588> For The <WG1063> Power <WG1411> Of Me <WG3450> In <WG1722> Weakness <WG769> Is Perfected. <WG5048> Most Gladly <WG2236> Therefore <WG3767> Rather <WG3123> Will I Boast <WG2744> In <WG1722> <WG3588> <WG769> My Weaknesses <WG3450> That <WG2443> May Dwell <WG1981> ' Upon <WG1909> Me <WG1691> The <WG3588> Power <WG1411> Of The <WG3588> Christ. <WG5547>

Wherefore <WG1352> I Take Pleasure <WG2106> In <WG1722> Weaknesses, <WG769> In <WG1722> Insults, <WG5196> In <WG1722> Necessities, <WG318> In <WG1722> Persecutions, <WG1375> In <WG1722> Straits, <WG4730> For <WG5228> Christ : <WG5547> <WG3752> For When <WG1063> I May Be Weak, <WG770> Then <WG5119> Powerful <WG1415> I Am. <WG1510>

I Have Become <WG1096> A Fool <WG878> Boasting; <WG2744> Ye <WG5210> Me <WG3165> Compelled : <WG315> <WG1473> For I 1063 CONJ Ought 3784 V-IAI-1S ' By 5259 PREP You 5216 P-2GP To Have Been Commended; 4921 V-PPN 3762 A-ASN For Nothing 1063 CONJ I Was Behind 5302 V-AAI-1S Those 3588 T-GPM 5228 PREP In A Surpassing Degree 3029 ADV Apostles, 652 N-GPM If 1487 COND Also 2532 CONJ Nothing 3762 A-NSN I Am. 1510 V-PXI-1S

The <WG3588> Indeed <WG3303> Signs <WG4592> Of The <WG3588> Apostle <WG652> Were Worked Out <WG2716> Among <WG1722> You <WG5213> In <WG1722> All <WG3956> Endurance, <WG5281> In <WG1722> Signs <WG4592> And <WG2532> Wonders <WG5059> And <WG2532> Works Of Power. <WG1411>

<WG5101> For In What <WG1063> Is It <WG2076> That <WG3739> Ye Were Inferior <WG2274> Beyond <WG5228> The <WG3588> Rest Of The <WG3062> Assemblies, <WG1577> <WG1487> Unless <WG3361> That <WG3754> Myself <WG846> I 1473 P-1NS 3756 PRT-N Did Not Lazily Burden 2655 V-AAI-1S You? 5216 P-2GP Forgive 5483 V-ADM-2P Me 3427 P-1DS 3588 T-ASF 93 N-ASF This Injustice. 3778 D-ASF

Lo, <WG2400> A Third Time <WG5154> Ready <WG2093> I Am <WG2192> To Come <WG2064> To <WG4314> You, <WG5209> And <WG2532> I Will <WG3756> Not Lazily Burden <WG2655> You; <WG5216> <WG3756> <WG1063> For I Do Not Seek <WG2212> The Things <WG3588> Of You, <WG5216> ' But <WG235> You; <WG5209> <WG3756> For Not <WG1063> Ought <WG3784> The <WG3588> Children <WG5043> For The <WG3588> Parents <WG1118> To Treasure Up, <WG2343> ' But <WG235> The <WG3588> Parents <WG1118> For The <WG3588> Children. <WG5043>

<WG1473> Now I 1161 CONJ Most Gladly 2236 ADV Will Spend 1159 V-FAI-1S And 2532 CONJ Will Be Utterly Spent 1550 V-FPI-1S For 5228 PREP 3588 T-GPF Souls 5590 N-GPF Your, 5216 P-2GP If 1487 COND Even 2532 CONJ More Abundantly 4056 ADV You 5209 P-2AP Loving, 25 V-PAP-NSM Less 2276 A-ASN I Am Loved. 25 V-PPI-1S

<WG2077> But Be It So, <WG1161> I 1473 P-1NS 3756 PRT-N Did Not Burden 2599 V-AAI-1S You; 5209 P-2AP ' But 235 CONJ Being 5225 V-PAP-NSM Crafty 3835 N-NSM With Guile 1388 N-DSM You 5209 P-2AP I Took. 2983 V-2AAI-1S
<WG3361> Any <WG5100> Of Whom <WG3739> I Have Sent <WG649> To <WG4314> You, <WG5209> ' By <WG1223> Him <WG846> Did I Overreach <WG4122> You? <WG5209>

I Besought <WG3870> Titus, <WG5103> And <WG2532> Sent With <WG4882> Him The <WG3588> <WG80> <WG3361> Brother : <WG5100> Did Overreach <WG4122> You <WG5209> Titus? <WG5103> Not <WG3756> By The <WG3588> Same <WG846> Spirit <WG4151> Walked We? <WG4043> Not <WG3756> In The <WG3588> Same <WG846> Steps? <WG2487>

Again <WG3825> Do Ye Think <WG1380> That <WG3754> To You <WG5213> We Are Making A Defence? <WG626> Before <WG2714> <WG3588> God <WG2316> In <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> We Speak; <WG2980> <WG3588> <WG1161> And All Things, <WG3956> Beloved, <WG27> For <WG5228> <WG3588> <WG5216> Your Building Up. <WG3619>

<WG5399> For I Fear, <WG1063> Lest Perhaps <WG3381> Having Come <WG2064> Not <WG3756> Such As <WG3634> I Wish <WG2309> I Should Find <WG2147> You, <WG5209> And I 2504 P-1NS-C Be Found 2147 V-APS-1S By You 5213 P-2DP Such As 3634 K-ASM 3756 PRT-N Ye Do Not Wish : 2309 V-PAI-2P Lest Perhaps There Be 3381 CONJ Strifes, 2054 N-NPF, Jealousies, 2205 N-NPM Indignations, 2372 N-NPM Contentions, 2052 N-NPF Evil Speakings, 2636 N-NPF Wisperings, 5587 N-NPM Puffings Up, 5450 N-NPF Commotions; 181 N-NPF

Lest <WG3361> Again <WG3825> Having Come <WG2064> Me <WG3165> Should Humble <WG5013> <WG3588> God <WG2316> My <WG3450> As To <WG4314> You, <WG5209> And <WG2532> I Should Mourn Over <WG3996> Many <WG4183> Of Those Who <WG3588> Have Before Sinned, <WG4258> And <WG2532> <WG3361> Have Not Repented <WG3340> Upon <WG1909> The <WG3588> Uncleanness <WG167> And <WG2532> Fornication <WG4202> And <WG2532> Licentiousness <WG766> Which <WG3739> They Practised. <WG4238>
